about_the_game:
Last Word is an adventure in pontification, a gallop into the realm of gossip, and a really cool game. It's a conversation piece about conversation that can be enjoyed to the last drop, like a fine red wine (unless you prefer white).

Experience the intriguing and ear-defying original soundtrack to Last Word. It blends piano, strings, horns, and marvelous-ness. The eerie tones and continuous themes add to the world of St. Lauden in a special way that will have you chattering all night long!

All tracks are composed by Lannie "Merlandese" Neely III and brilliantly mixed/mastered by Fernando "Ferdk" Carabajal.
